entry.string: The Figlet module uses a class written by Lucas Baltes to transform text to Ascii art. This module includes a special text transform called transformfig which will take any call to it and transform the text to Ascii art of your choosing. It also offers a user page to allow any text to be transformed. Good for use with signatures, etc.
entry.translation: Zee Feeglet mudoole-a uses a cless vreettee by Looces Beltes tu trunsffurm text tu Esceei ert. Um de hur de hur de hur. Thees mudoole-a incloodes a speceeel text trunsffurm celled trunsffurmffeeg vheech veell teke-a uny cell tu it und trunsffurm zee text tu Esceei ert ooff yuoor chuuseeng. It elsu ooffffers a user pege-a tu elloo uny text tu be-a trunsffurmed. Bork bork bork! Guud fur use-a veet seegnetoores, itc.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a.

entry.string: "Modify Configuration". From this menu option, you can update the necessary configuration options, such as the default font to use.
entry.translation: "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun". Frum thees menoo oopshun, yuoo cun updete-a zee necessery cunffeegooreshun oopshuns, sooch es zee deffoolt funt tu use-a.

entry.string: The Mail Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Meeel Mudoole-a hes nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The figlet modules uses a special case text transform which when called will transform text to ascii art.
entry.translation: Zee feeglet mudooles uses a speceeel cese-a text trunsffurm vheech vhee celled veell trunsffurm text tu esceei ert. Um de hur de hur de hur.
